title: How to make Goodreads stop friending me with all my Facebook friends - Quora

response.answer_text: Dena TarlinFrom what I can tell, the best way to keep GoodReads from adding all your Facebook friends is to keep the accounts completely separate, using different email addresses. You would also have to delete the GoodReads app on Facebook.  It seems like some people have also had problems with this when they use both apps on the same mobile device.  I am linking to a GoodReads Feedback discussion that may be helpful. I could be wrong, and perhaps someone else will chime in with suggestions as to how to keep these accounts linked without losing control of your GoodReads friend list. But as far as I can tell, it seems to be an all-or-nothing kind of thing: http://www.goodreads.com/topic/s...
